item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1351; 06:21PM; 4086 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vs0qWc; Historic South-Central; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters extinguished the fire in 31 minutes with no injuries reported. The rapid deployment of large diameter handlines to defend the exposed buildings successfully prevented the fire from extending into the exposed structures although there is exterior damage. The two (vacant) single family dwellings were fully involved. LAFD Arson investigators are responding for the cause investigation. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM22 E10 E13 E15 E203 E209 E21 E210 E215 E221 E233 E3 E66 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA14 RA814 RA815 RA846 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T33 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1351; 05:50PM; 4086 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vs0qWc; Historic South-Central; One story (vacant), single family dwelling with heavy fire showing. Firefighters are in a transitional mode in property protection profile. There are two structures exposed. Additional resources were requested. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E10 E15 E21 E215 E221 E66 RA14 RA846 SQ21 T15 T21; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Physical Rescue - FATALITY; INC#1155; 04:19PM; 4700 N Tujunga Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pq8dQD; North Hollywood; The adult male patient extricated from under the trailer was sadly beyond medical help and determined deceased on scene. Any further media inquires are directed to LAPD Inc# 3075 or LA County Coroner. No further details.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E278 E60 E86 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 T60 T78 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Physical Rescue ; INC#1155; 04:00PM; 4700 N Tujunga Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pq8dQD; North Hollywood; One patient was extricated from under a trailer (attached to a pick up truck) and is being evaluated for treatment / transport by paramedics. Age/gender/condition are unknown at this time. ; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E278 E60 E86 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 T60 T78 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Physical Rescue ; INC#1155; 03:38PM; 4700 N Tujunga Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pq8dQD; North Hollywood; One patient trapped (condition/age/gender unknown at this time) under an approximately 25' trailer. LAPD Inc#3075; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E278 E60 E86 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 T60 T78 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0286; 06:51AM; 5420 N Nagle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M4RITX; Sherman Oaks; KNOCKDOWN: 81 firefighters extinguished the fire in one hour and 12 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters will continue to overhaul and address any remaining smoldering areas. LAFD Arson investigators are responding for the investigation. No further details.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 AR21 AR35 BC10 BC12 BC14 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E278 E288 E289 E298 E39 E88 E99 EA1 EM17 HR3 PH1 RA102 RA78 RA878 RA889 T39 T60 T78 T88 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0286; 06:27AM; 5420 N Nagle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M4RITX; Sherman Oaks; Firefighters made good progress against the blaze and are rooting out fire between (in) the floors (1st and 2nd) and sections of the structure that are difficult to reach due to the roof collapse and burned out floor. LAFD Arson and Counter-Terrorism Section is responding for the investigation. The home appears to either be newly built or undergoing renovations and is not occupied. No injuries reported.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 AR21 BC10 BC12 BC14 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E278 E288 E289 E298 E39 E88 E99 EA1 EM17 HR3 RA102 RA78 RA878 RA889 T39 T60 T78 T88 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0286; 05:39AM; 5420 N Nagle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M4RITX; Sherman Oaks; Large, two story home with fire through the roof and partial roof collapse. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. It appears the home is under renovation and is not occupied at the time. Additional resources were requested. No other structures are exposed. No injuries reported. This incident is at the Greater Alarm status.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC12 BC14 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E278 E288 E289 E298 E39 E88 E99 EM17 HR3 RA102 RA878 RA889 T39 T60 T78 T88 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1627; 09:19PM; 334 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hpuNV2; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: 74 firefighters extinguished the fire in 38 minutes with no injuries reported.. There was smoke but no fire on the 2nd floor and 3rd floors (both vacant). Firefighters are conducting smoke removal operations to clear the floors. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E227 E27 E3 E4 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA2 RA27 RA3 SQ21 T10 T11 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27; CH7; 13 15; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - Car into Structure; INC#1622; 09:08PM; 22570 W Lull St; MAP: https://bit.ly/35kjsTI; West Hills; One car into the garage of a single story, single family dwelling. The two occupants of the vehicle sustained only minor injuries with one transported. There were no injuries to the occupants (number unknown) of the home. Only the garage sustained damage to the structural integrity. LAFD Urban Search and Rescue is on scene evaluating the garage and the LA Building and Safety is responding to determine the status of the structure. The 9-1-1 call was received at 8:37PM. LAPD Inc# 3890. No further details.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E104 E105 E106 E305 EM17 HR3 RA104 RA106 RA72 T105 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart
